isis.stitle: TSI 97-12-23 - UVC Harness Injector Connector Seal Was Eliminated On The International® T 444E, DT 466E and 530E Engines

subjectgroup.subject: UVC Harness Injector Connector Seal Was Eliminated On The International® T 444E, DT 466E and 530E Engines

geninfo.para: The engine electrical harness assembly (P/N 1815923C92 for T 444E engines ( Figure 1) and 1807285C92 for DT 466E/530E Engines [ Figure 2]) located under the valve cover (UVC) has been revised. The harness connector seal at the injectors was removed. The seal is no longer required for production use; it was never a serviceable part.

The seal was eliminated in production during model year 1995 as a running change. The seal is not required for any engine in service. Function is the same with or without the seal. Do not replace UVC harness because of a missing seal.

figure.caption: Figure 1. T 444E Engine Under Valve Cover Harness Connector Seal
Figure 2. DT 466E/350E Engine Under Valve Cover Harness Connector Seal
